resources.string: Elena\'s hummingbird weighs as much as a 20 cent coin.
In the 17th century, carrots weren\'t orange.
Oysters can change sex when mating.
A bedbug can lay 150 eggs in your mattress.
In the first weeks of gestation, the skin of the fetus is transparent.
This bird actually weighs less than a 5 euro cent coin, about 2 g for a size of 5 cm.
At that time, carrots in Europe were predominantly purple. Since then, the orange variety has established itself as the most popular.
An oyster can thus change sex once per reproduction period. The younger the oyster, the more likely it is to change sex.
At a rate of 2 to 3 eggs per day, the bed bug can lay 150 eggs in your mattress in its lifetime.
The International Federation of Boules Sports, founded in 1985, has been trying to add p√©tanque to the Olympics for decades.
As the weeks progress, the skin of the fetus becomes more opaque.
